name: EFYS - Escape From Your Sins
description:
"Are you tired of being punished and sentenced to eternal agony here in hell?

I offer you a chance to get a second chance, to return to earth and make up for your sins.

Take part in EFYS, the most diabolical game ever invented, survive hordes of demons, win as many points as possible and, above all, make me HAVE FUN !! "

In EFYS you are condemned to hell and you are offered the opportunity to return to earth by participating in a race in which the goal is to earn as many points as possible by staying within a "Safezone".

But it won't be that easy:

hordes of demons of all kinds will attack you and prevent you from staying in the Safezone so fight with your all ...

Unless you prefer to have fun with us until the end of time!
